bankers brexit is in favor of the EU now
before we get started I just want to
know if anyone remembers watching the

for another
chances are that coin would have been a

rarer by the day the morgan silver

see the central bankers they never do

is why the EU was out there threatening

what's going to happen is most likely
this plan is going to be in a

because we've said this from the

this is the signal that he's going after

state has done
to our economy he's removing a lot of

can he just reverse everything in two

there's many people working on this

he's telling me this is a bad deal and
